title: Craziest Call In Show History
description:
Blind Mike is back from his vacation in Florida and ready to defend his anti-social behavior while in Magnolia.(1:00) During a 98.5 after show, Mike Felger and Jim Murray discuss not being allowed to appear on other podcasts such as KMS.(21:00) John Hinckley Jr., the man who shot President Ronald Reagan, is now playing venues around the country on his redemption tour. (39:40) Kevin From Bristol angrily calls in about his video asking Minifans to vote in a contest being shown to Kirk by Justin yesterday.(1:33:30) A call from Jerry West, radio announcers getting duped by satire accounts and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
